name: Bugs (itch)
description:
Hello everyone!

I am currently working on teaching myself game design and programming. So for my first act as a new dev I welcome you all to play my first short test of a game, Bugs. Its a straightforward Galaga style space shooter with unique ships and abilities.

As this is just my first experiment working in Gamemaker it's missing a lot of polish. It's not intended to really be a final product, more of a test. I am not currently intending on continuing work on this project however I may revisit the concept in the future. I do however have a prototype of an idea on my mind that I can hopefully share something of soon.
